mapper.sql: ID, CLASS_NAME, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CASE_TYPE, COMP_ID, DEL_USER, DEL_TIME, IS_DEL, AUDIT_RESOURCE, CAN_DEL, NEED_AUDIT, AUDIT_PROCESS_ID, DEPT_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from AUDIT_CLASS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into AUDIT_CLASS (CLASS_NAME, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CASE_TYPE, COMP_ID, DEL_USER, DEL_TIME, IS_DEL, AUDIT_RESOURCE, CAN_DEL, NEED_AUDIT, AUDIT_PROCESS_ID, DEPT_ID) values (#{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{caseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{auditResource,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{canDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{needAudit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{auditProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update AUDIT_CLASS
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CLASS_NAME = #{record.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_TIME = #{record.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CASE_TYPE = #{record.caseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_USER = #{record.delUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_TIME = #{record.delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
AUDIT_RESOURCE = #{record.auditResource,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CAN_DEL = #{record.canDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},

AUDIT_PROCESS_ID = #{record.auditProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update AUDIT_CLASS set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CLASS_NAME = #{record.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_TIME = #{record.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CASE_TYPE = #{record.caseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_USER = #{record.delUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{record.delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AUDIT_RESOURCE = #{record.auditResource,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CAN_DEL = #{record.canDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, NEED_AUDIT = #{record.needAudit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AUDIT_PROCESS_ID = #{record.auditProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update AUDIT_CLASS
CLASS_NAME = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_USER = #{delUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
AUDIT_RESOURCE = #{auditResource,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CAN_DEL = #{canDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
NEED_AUDIT = #{needAudit,jdbcType=TINYINT},
AUDIT_PROCESS_ID = #{auditProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update AUDIT_CLASS set CLASS_NAME = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_USER = #{delUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AUDIT_RESOURCE = #{auditResource,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CAN_DEL = #{canDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, NEED_AUDIT = #{needAudit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AUDIT_PROCESS_ID = #{auditProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
